title: Kim Potter, ex-officer convicted in fatal shooting of Daunte Wright, sentenced to 2 years in prison -- less than prosecutors requested - CNN
content:
1. Kim Potter, ex-officer convicted in fatal shooting of Daunte Wright, sentenced to 2 years in prison -- less than prosecutors requested  CNN
  2. Kim Potter sentencing: Ex-cop who killed Daunte Wright hit with 16 months behind bars  Fox News
  3. Kim Potter Sentenced To 2 Years For Daunte Wright Killing  MSNBC
  4. Kimberly Potter to be sentenced Friday; prosecutors reverse course from asking for longer sentence  Minneapolis Star Tribune
  5. Kim Potter sentenced to 2 years in Daunte Wright's death  Yahoo News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Kim Potter, the former Minnesota police officer who mistakenly drew a gun instead of a Taser and fatally shot Daunte Wright, was sentenced to 2 years in prison on Friday, nearly two months after she was convicted of first- and second-degree manslaughter.
